org.purewidgets.server.application
Interface PDApplicationLifeCycle

public interface PDApplicationLifeCycle

This interface defines the methods for the application life-cycle. Life-cycle: onPDApplicationLoaded->(Action Events)->onPDApplicationEnded

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

Method Summary
 void onPDApplicationEnded()
          Finish is called on every session, at the end.
 void onPDApplicationLoaded(PDApplication application)
          Loaded is called for every session after the application is loaded (or created if it is the first time)
 

Method Detail

onPDApplicationLoaded

void onPDApplicationLoaded(PDApplication application)
Loaded is called for every session after the application is loaded (or created if it is the first time)

Parameters:
application -

onPDApplicationEnded

void onPDApplicationEnded()
Finish is called on every session, at the end. Before finish is called there may be several onAction calls in result to user input and this is probably where most of the action will be. Finish allows the application to display results based on its current state and after integrating the potential user input.
